medical_history.chief_complaint: Persistent colicky right upper quadrant abdominal pain radiating to her back.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began suddenly at 7am this morning, persisting for approximately 16 hours. The patient has experienced similar RUQ pain for the past years, typically resolving after a few minutes. Currently, there is decreased oral tolerance and nausea. Denies vomiting, chills, or fevers.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Obesity, eczema, headache. Past surgical history includes knee surgery and carpal tunnel surgery.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of liver or gallbladder disease.
